alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:01PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSCEOLA...DICKINSON...NORTH CENTRAL CLAY AND SOUTHERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Park, or 8 miles west of Spirit Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Orleans, Spirit Lake, Okoboji, Wahpeton, Milford, West Okoboji, Arnolds Park, Fostoria and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
